title: riot,  fuck you ,  time to say bye bye to u guys,
body: i paid  3145 australian doller  , in this free game ,  my friend say  i'm crazy ,  but no ,  i just love this game ,  but  now ,  i got ban  for toxic,  lol,  last game ,  ididn't toxic,  i just lose lane ,  and my teammate try to talking to me , ,  ye ,  my english is so bad,  i don't know how to explain this,   i wrote  a lot ticket  to u motherfuking dogs,  but  nothing,   i'm hope less now ,  but  remember,  its not ok ,  u banned me for last game its not ok ,  i can't forgort this motherfuking things in my life,  fuck you all . riot

replies.body: You always seem to have the right meme

There's most certainly a fair and logical reason riot banned you. 

They would also send evidence of why you got banned. 

If you think it's unfair then go send a support ticket to them.
